website_summaries.verdict: Nice stick for beginners that has a great feel to help players learn to control the ball.
pros: Stick ships in a kit that also includes some gear and a ball to help you get started playing field hockey
Offered in several sizes and colors
Stick's construction allows for good ball control
cons: You might not need the included gear
Carrying bag is not of a high quality

customer_reviews.title: This is such a great beginners pack
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great beginners pack! The shin guards are a little too big at this point but my daughter loves the bag and has had a blast playing with this! Super cute colors and quality seems to be there as well. We have had it a week or so and the paint hasn't chipped at all on the stick.
customer_reviews.author: N. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great bundle
customer_reviews.text: Great field hockey package for my twin 8 year olds. My only caveat is that the bottom of the stick had chipped paint on the first day that went to the bare frame, although I assume that’s normal. Other than that this bundle is perfect. We love the carrying bag for easy storage & transportation. My newly 8 year olds got a size 32 and they are 44 inches tall for reference.
customer_reviews.author: RunningMom4

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.text: SUPERIOR customer service!! Love the set, my daughter is super excited. Thank You!!! Saved as a favorite seller for all future sports equipment purchases.
customer_reviews.author: coupon mom

customer_reviews.title: Poorly constructed and packaged
customer_reviews.text: The shin guards were folded in half when arrived and therefore arrived cracked down the middle. The netting pocket was not sewn completely on, leaving a rather large hole in the bottom of the pocket. My daughter loved everything else about it and wanted to keep it so I had to order new shin guards, which cost me an additional $15.
customer_reviews.author: McOliveto

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Happy!
customer_reviews.text: Originally the bag we received was too small and we were extremely disappointed. Then Sports Unlimited reached out to us and offered another bag, as well as an upgraded bag due to our order having a defective bag. We accepted the standard bag and wow it is awesome! Thank you very much for standing by your product and contacting me with a solution. We will definitely use Sports Unlimited again!
customer_reviews.author: Lis Cass

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our granddaughter who went to a field hockey "camp" all we needed to get separately was the mouth guard. The shin guards are okay, but if we do this again we will get stronger ones. But it did the job!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Werner

customer_reviews.title: Great product & Great company
customer_reviews.text: Great product but even better customer service. Product is great and is perfect for a beginner at field hockey. I don't usually write reviews but i had to deal with the company directly for this order and I was so impressed with their customer service. 2 thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi B

customer_reviews.title: Good package value.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set for my 7-year old-who is in her second year of field hockey. The stick is great. The shin guards are great. But after 4 trips to the field (in a car), the stick bag is already falling apart. The only thing we put in it besides the stick is a mouthguard, in the side mesh pocket. Seeing what other bags cost, though, I'm ok with it. We'll upgrade next year!
customer_reviews.author: Carol L Berman

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: smaller than advertised and arrived cheap and not well designed.
customer_reviews.author: Tim McArdle

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for my daughter that was starting her first ...
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase for my daughter that was starting her first year of field hockey. It arrived quickly and is easy to store and keep her organized (6 year old) Would buy from here again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kit is OK. Shin guards broke within 2 uses.
customer_reviews.text: One of the shin guards broke within 2 practices of use. The rest of the kit is OK and my daughter has no complaints. Just the shin guards. For other buyers - you may need to budget for a separate purchase of shin guards.
customer_reviews.author: electronicguru77

customer_reviews.title: Total package for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Excellent starter package for my 9 year old granddaughter trying out the sport. Cheap enough not to get upset if she chooses not to continue next year. Everything she needed was included in this package highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: patricia st. pierre

customer_reviews.title: Great stick, held up well
customer_reviews.text: Great stick, held up well. The shin guards were WAY to big for my daughter though stick is measured based on her height. Small pocket for ball and mouthpiece so the essentials are all kept together.
customer_reviews.author: dj

customer_reviews.title: Purple Field hockey set
customer_reviews.text: My eight year daughter is playing in pee wee field hockey 🏑🏑league and loves this set and fits great for her size! She got it as a birthday gift and it’s her favorite 😁happy kiddo.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa W.

customer_reviews.title: Great starter package
customer_reviews.text: The equipment was just perfect for what we needed. My eight year old was trying field hockey out for the first time. The only negative was the shin guards. They were to uncomfortable. Hard and rigid. So my daughter refused to wear them. Other than that it’s a great starter package.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the whole set
customer_reviews.text: Everything was nice, love the stick. The only bad thing was that the bag in the inside begin to loose the painting day 2
customer_reviews.author: eileen

customer_reviews.title: The stick and shin guards have been fine and no issues
customer_reviews.text: The bag that came with this set has fallen a part after not even 1 season of regular use. The stick and shin guards have been fine and no issues. I tried to contact the company about the bag but have yet to hear back. Had to purchase a new bag from another company.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the package. Sized well for my beginner. Shin pads a little large, but she will grow into them.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: great for my extremely tall 7 year old
customer_reviews.text: this was great for a first time field hockey camp. It was a better price than the used ones at play it again sports, and she got more equipment with it!
customer_reviews.author: Doodle's Ma

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Starter set for Field Hockey
customer_reviews.text: This is a great starter set for Field Hockey! My daughter is 9 and is loving the gear.
customer_reviews.author: C. Newton

customer_reviews.title: Good set for first timer to field hockey
customer_reviews.text: This set has been a big help considering this is the first year that my daughter plays field hockey. A big plus, was the price too.
customer_reviews.author: Duane

customer_reviews.title: The size up of the hockey stick!
customer_reviews.text: How to size up the Hockey Stick when ordering ! Great job..my son who is 7yrs young loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Carl Kelley

customer_reviews.title: 24" Stick is great, huge bag is not.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 24" stick (the smallest size) for my 4 year old niece. The stick and ball are great. She loves the pink stick and rainbow colored ball. The bag is huge however, guess it was just 1 size fits all. Figured maybe ordering the smallest stick would get a smaller bag and smaller shin guards. Maybe she can use them when shes in middle school, but for now they are way too big.
customer_reviews.author: Mary T

customer_reviews.title: The ball was broken when it arrived. I will ...
customer_reviews.text: The ball was broken when it arrived. I will update my opinion after my daughter starts her season and really uses it all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... a stick her size - this is such a perfect beginner set
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 3 years old and I have been looking for a stick her size - this is such a perfect beginner set! I can't wait to teach her how to play Field Hockey!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Preston

customer_reviews.title: Price
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awesome value and great quality... Shin guards were a little too big
customer_reviews.author: Haley Leibelsperger

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this package for my 8 year old. She is very tiny and the shin guards fit well and the stick was the perfect size. She loves that it is blue. Bag is of decent quality at half the price of comepetators. Overall great quality and great price.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffani Rombach

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great deal - if you buy these things separately it costs a lot more.
customer_reviews.author: boo boo

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Everything was great! Shin guards split in half after one season but everything else was great!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: Stick, ball, goggles & bag are fine, but the shin guards are cheap and cracked the first day
customer_reviews.author: KIKI

customer_reviews.title: Broken knee pads
customer_reviews.text: Both knee pads broke after 2 practices and my daughter is only 5 - stick was average but good value and bag was nice
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Ok, not the best
customer_reviews.text: Mainly purchased for stick. Bag is very poor quality and Shin guards way too big for youth.
customer_reviews.author: Wynter W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect starting field hockey package for my 6 year old daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Justin M Stoner

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and Durable!
customer_reviews.text: Nice set. Held up well during an entire season of intense use. Love the blue!
customer_reviews.author: Kearison

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we ordered for first year field hockey player.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great set! My daughter is almost 9 and she is using the 32. Perfect for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Gift Card Recipient

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great starter kit and great price. Not worth spend more money for first-year player.
customer_reviews.author: 5H

customer_reviews.title: Great Choice
customer_reviews.text: This set, which arrived quickly and packed with care, is the perfect size and price for my first yr player who is 8.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L. Heisler

customer_reviews.title: ball and bag were perfect for a youth starting field hockey
customer_reviews.text: Stick, ball and bag were perfect for a youth starting field hockey. However, the shin guards were way too big.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Deemer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product for price. Bought for niece who was starting field hockey.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price! Fast delivery. Daughter used for field hockey camp as a beginner and it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Schomber

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Half the price of what you'd pay in sporting good stores
customer_reviews.author: jacait

customer_reviews.title: The set is perfect for our needs
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it, and it came the very next day! 😊 Thank you! The set is perfect for our needs!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My dad gated loves her new equipment. Perfect for a beginning 9 yr old.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of the shin guards broke after taking them off.
customer_reviews.text: Its a cheap starter set but should not have broken so easily. Worst product!
customer_reviews.author: JCP

product_meta.title: STRYK Burst Beginner Field Hockey Stick Package
product_meta.description: The STRYK Burst Field Hockey Package is everything a field hockey newcomer needs to flourish. With a stick that was developed specifically to make the game easier for beginners, improvement and enjoyment are what to expect.
feature_bullets: ENTRY LEVEL PACKAGE: includes all the essential equipment needed for a field hockey beginner along with a rainbow colored ball.
STICK: Wooden construction for excellent durability. A 20mm bow and Midi head give the stick versatility, allowing it to work for any position in the field.
FIRST TOUCH TOE: Designed to reduce rebound and provide a forgiving feel, giving the stick excellent control. Ideal for those players developing their basic skills.

STICK BAG: Large main compartment holds two sticks, while the breathable mesh pocket is perfect for shin guard or cleat storage. The small zipper pocket stores small items securely. Also comes with adjustable padded shoulder strap.

SHIN GUARDS: Molded plastic provide exceptional protection for shins and ankles. Adjustable straps and venting holes offer breathability and secure fit. Sized to fit a player’s height based on stick size.
